reviews.review:
Hmmm 121 hours in, I'd say this game is rather toxic to play. As a killer and survivor, you're assigned ranks (1 being the highest 20 being the lowest) for your skill level but unfortunately the rank-matching has been a disaster. 
New to the game, fresh killer and all, and you'll be matched with the (1-12) ranks survivors with absolutely all the best perks like five seconds stun decisive strike and the flashlight clicking. It doesn't happen just once or twice, it happens about 1/2 of the times, and tell you what, it is the worst aspect of this game. 
As a survivor, you don't get to do much other than running around and fixing generators THAT'S IT. Some people might find it fun juking the killer and all, but the skill ceiling is high and I don't want to spend 100 hours training my juke just to waste another minute of the killer.

Want a better killer/ slasher game? Try Friday the 13th. It's buggy but it's so much more fun.

Вот я наиграл достаточное число часов, чтобы вынести вердикт...
Во-первых, игра [u]НЕ хоррор[/u].
Во-вторых, концепт игры неоднократно пытались [strike]спиздить[/strike] позаимствовать.
В-третьих, это в своём роде соревновательная асиметричная игра 4 v 1.
Минусы присутствуют, а именно: куча багов, очень токсичное комьюнити, разработчики, которые не умеют сопоставлять правильный баланс.
Подводя итог. Мне понравилось. Причём интересно играть как за выжившего, так и за маньяка. Рекомендую.
güzel oyun ama "dedicated servers" çok sıkıntılı dead hard atıyorun işlemiyor skill check i great atıyorum işlemiyor ama eğlenceli

Since I either have to choose between yes and no, I will choose yes, but I'd rather choose "eh". The game itself is rather buggy, with killer landing hits they shouldn't. Even after they fixed the vault, the problems persist. The community is rather toxic as well, but hey, it's fun to watch them have a sissy tantrum once the game is done. Sure, it's kinda fun but it also isn't. Also, this is the only game I've seen that's unbalanced for both Survivor and Killer, so there's that too. Over all a decent expirience, but not worth 20 euro.
игра супер секс рекомендую игра не для нытиков повторяю)

O jogo é muito bom, mas tem uns prolemas de servidor e muita gente tóxica, mas tirando isso o jogo é bem legal e divertido, mas nao tenho nenhum amigo pra jogar, entao jogo sozinho, mas mesmo assim me divirto bastante.
This game is awesome. I only have to deinstall and reinstall after every update because it always crashes.
um dos melhores jogos que ja joguei!!!!

Pretty good game. The game is awesome at low ranks as there is way less stress when playing, As you get better and better the game can become more stressful and sometimes less fun. This however doesnt mean that the game is not worth buying. The game is unique in everyway and I definitly reccomend you buying it.
Great teamwork game if you talk with friends on discord or something
This Game Has Been a 50/50 for me for awhile now, but ive always sticked around and im glad i did, because i made a few friends :)

One of the only Multiplayer games I actually enjoy.

A treat for any fans of horror movies or games.
It is very fun and has great replay value in my opinion. It is hard to get sick of playing.
It is a fun game, but you will go down a dark path ;)

É um ótimo jogo tanto para quem está sozinho quanto para jogar com os amigos, todo o suspense e a adrenalina gerada, é bem divertido. Porém, o jogo ainda possui muitos bugs que precisam ser arrumados o quanto antes.
Murder is fun! Great game despite the toxic culture only huge drawback is the constant issues with "EAC cannot be instantiated" error preventing me playing this game for months at a time.
I have played this game for a little while, new player friendly. No toxicity either I would recommend

Разработчики - когда у нас в игре перестанут лагать скил чеки ? Когда кончатся хиты через окна ? Когда убийы перестанут попадать находясь в нескольких метрах от выжевшего ? Может вместо сраной косметики, лучше пофиксить баги ? Почему Убийцы застривают в палетах ? Почему когда начинаешь лечить выжившего - лечение прерывается, хотя с чего бы это ?
Игра крутая но учтите обязательную покупку дополнений

Lo que me ha gustado es que se puede jugar con amigos, sin embargo, hay varias cosas que arreglaría del juego, por ejemplo, cuando se tiran los palets o cuando se salta sobre uno. Sería bueno hacerlo de manera más rápida, pero por lo demás, es buenísimo
It's a little hard to get into because it's very unlike any other game out there, but it is an extremely rewarding experience.
весело играть с друзьяями которых у меня нет)
Маньяки, маньяки, и ещё раз маньяки. 8 из 10.
It's a great game and I absolutely love it! But it still has some clitches.. But besides that, it's awesome ;) I'm glad that my friends sugested this game to me
this game is amazing just amazing, even though it really isint a horror game when you play it enough.
This game is so much fun. Highly recommended!

Jogo muito bom, pena que existe vários bugs, eles como Sistema de Rank na partida exemplo Rank 20 caindo com killer Rank 1 ou vice versa, outro bug muito esquisito é em relação com a Hit Box, onde o killer está a vários metros de distância e ainda acerta o hit, e também todo dias na parte da tarde o ping vai de 60 padrão para 195, mas alem desses bugs eu ainda gosto dessa merda S2 Behavior
比较喜欢和队友一起挂在地下室的树上，像回到家里一样感到舒适

É um jogo meio esquisito, cheio de bugs que nunca vão ser concertador e que vai te fazer passar muita raiva. Mas o jogo é muito bom e consegue te prender com uma mecanica muito unica, alem de ser extremamente competitivo e despertar uma vontade de ser cada vez melhor e aprender como loopar, dar double back, jogar de killer e de survivor
ну что могу сказать об игре её угробили сами разрабы но игра до сейх пор живёт и пополняется новыми игроками ну и я играю дальше игру могу посоветовать тем у кого железные нервы

Buen juego para pasar el rato, mejor jugar con amigos que solo porque la mayoria no te ayuda. La mayoria de los que juegan de asesinos campean a muerte no les gusta perder,es lo unico malo que veo en el juego tendrian que poner algo para que no se queden cerca tuyo cuando estas colgado, pero despues es muy divertido, etc
Przyjemna gra do grania ze znajomymi. Polecam jak lubicie grać w gry w których skupienie gra ważną rolę.
